PRECIOUS MOMENTS \"SINGAPORE GIRL\" (70T.description: “Singapore Girl”, an exclusive collaboration between Precious Moments® and Singapore Airlines, features the internationally renowned teardrop-eyed Precious Moments® doll dressed in the Singapore Girl’s distinctive batik sarong kebaya uniform. A symbol of Asian grace and hospitality, this collectible figurine has been exquisitely handcrafted and painted, making it a must-have memento to commemorate your journey with us.This edition of the Precious Moments "Singapore Girl" presenting a birthday cake commemorates the airline’s 70th anniversary celebration in 2017. Available for purchase for collection on flights or home delivery. While stocks last. Figurine size: 8. 5 cm x 8.9 cm x 16 cm (L x W x H).Note: No two figurines are identical as this item is handcrafted and painted.

It has eight adjustable intensities for a fully customisable cleansing experience and an updated 3-zone facial brush, optimised for all skin types. Comes with a two-year warranty. Dimensions: 12.3cm (H) x 9.1cm (W) x 4.5cm (D).

While stocks last.

category: SINGAPORE SLING® ORIGINAL MIX – MINIATURE PACK

Comes with a book of 11 original Sling® cocktail recipes. 40ml x 2.

LA MER THE MOISTURIZING SOFT CREAM.description: Soft yet hardcore, this supple moisturising cream nourishes skin with an instant luminous finish. Created with Microscopic Moisturising Spheres for the ultimate smooth and lightweight texture, this soft variation of Crème de la Mer delivers the same game-changing benefits as the original. Skin looks instantly radiant and naturally balanced as imperfections fade. 60ml.

SWAROVSKI CRYSTALDUST BANGLE CHROME.description: Crafted using Swarovski’s Crystal Rock technique, it is lavishly encrusted with chrome-effect crystals for unparalleled sparkle. SCUDERIA FERRARI GENTS WATCH - PITLANE.description: Back for the Spring/Summer 2018 season, the Pitlane collection pares Scuderia Ferrari racing inspiration down to its essence, capturing the spirit of the sport and team pride in strong, simple, subtly branded design that are in their element at racing events. Sliding smoothly into case extensions between the lugs, the silicone strap that is detailed by a tire tread running along the left side of the strap, stretching into the dial. Powered by precise quartz-powered engines, and destined for wide appeal among a growing base of younger Scuderia Ferrari race team fans, these understated yet compelling new designs are water resistant to 3 ATM. 2-year limited international warranty. 38 mm

APPLE AIRPODS.description: Amazingly easy to use, AirPods combine intelligent design with breakthrough technology and crystal clear sound.1 Get up to 5 hours of listening time on one charge.2  Or up to 3 hours with just a 15-minute charge in the charging case. 31Requires an iCloud account and macOS Sierra, iOS 10 or watchOS 3, or later.2Testing conducted by Apple in August 2016 using pre‑production AirPods units and software paired with pre‑production iPhone 7 units and software. The playlist consisted of 358 unique audio tracks purchased from the iTunes Store (256-Kbps AAC encoding). Volume was set to 50 per cent. Testing consisted of full AirPods battery discharge while playing audio until the first AirPod stopped playback. Battery life depends on device settings, usage and many other factors.3Testing conducted by Apple in August 2016 using pre‑production AirPods units and software paired with pre‑production iPhone 7 units and software. The playlist consisted of 358 unique audio tracks purchased from the iTunes Store (256-Kbps AAC encoding). Volume was set to 50 per cent. Fifteen-minute-charge testing was conducted with drained AirPods that were charged for 15 minutes, then audio was played until the first AirPod stopped playback. Battery life depends on device settings, usage and many other factors.

SAMSUNG S9 BLACK 64GB.description: Dual ApertureThe camera that takes beautiful photos in different lighting conditions.Take photos without thinking twice—no matter the time of the day. With two f-stop modes, the category-defining Dual Aperture adapts to bright light and super low light automatically, like the human eye to give you the perfect shot.*Dual Aperture supports F1.5 and F2.4 modes. Installed on the rear camera (Galaxy S9)/rear wide camera (Galaxy S9+).Super Slow-moNext level slow-motion: Super Slow-mo.Shoot at incredible speed: 960 frames per second, thanks to the super speed sensor. Show off your videography skills by adding Super Slow-mo bursts to a video or spotlighting one moment.* Super Slow-mo only supports HD resolution. Limited to 20 shots per video with approximately 0.2 seconds of recording and 6 seconds of playback for each shot.AR EmojiTurn your selfie into an emoji and watch your messaging come alive.Create an animated version of yourself that shows off your inner you. Then, get your message across with an emoji that follows your movements and expressions.* Some movements and expressions may not be recognized.Trade up and save up to $610* with Samsung Trade Up ProgrammeSamsung Trade Up Programme lets you trade in your phone for Galaxy S9/S9+ with great value and convenience.Start this journey of seamless trade up by downloading the app to your existing or older device. For Android users, you can download Samsung Trade Up (SG) app on Google Play Store. As for iOS users, you can download Trade Smartly app from Apple App Store. It just takes 3 minutes to valuate your existing or old device (up to $610 exclusive trade-in value).Once you are happy with the trade-in value, you can transfer data to your new Galaxy S9/S9 at your own time. Then have your existing or old device collected at your doorstep (limited to Singapore addresses) and  reimbursement will be done via local bank transfer. Trade up and save now!Visit Samsung.com/sg/tradeup for more information.Exclusive trade-in value of $610 is based on Samsung Galaxy S8+ (64GB) and may vary depending on the device condition. Other terms and conditions apply.
